hero_title:
No Digital Presence?
We Build Your Professional Landing Page.
hero_desc: You don't need a huge website. You need a strategic Landing Page designed to sell your services and capture clients automatically.
problem_title:
Without a Landing Page,
You Are Losing Sales
problem_desc: Social media ads need a destination. If you send traffic to your profile, you lose money. You need a Landing Page that converts.
card_1_desc: We don't use generic templates. We design psychological structures to make users want to buy.
card_2_desc: Strategic buttons, persuasive copy, and ultra-fast loading speed.
card_3_desc: Domain, Hosting, SSL Certificate, and perfect mobile version. We take care of everything.
cta_mid_title: Your competitors already have a Landing Page. Do you?
test_1_text: "Jers Web Solutions perfectly understood our corporate needs. The Landing Page is technical, clean, and generates the trust our B2B clients demand."
test_2_text: "Incredible visual change for my brand. We went from nothing to a platform that truly highlights the quality of our embroidery. Sales increased rapidly."
test_3_text: "10/10 Support. Automating orders via WhatsApp saves us hours of manual work every day. It's the best investment we've made."
final_cta_desc: Do you want your project to be a success story too? Don't waste time.
footer_txt: Agency specialized in Landing Page Design and Sales Funnels.
cases_page_desc: We transform the digital identity of companies seeking efficiency and sales.
case_aircet_desc: Industrial B2B Landing Page. Optimized to build trust with B2B corporate clients.
case_jd_desc: Visual Textile Landing Page. High-impact catalog to showcase garment quality.
case_carbonato_desc: Laundry Delivery Landing Page. Fast ordering system focused on user convenience.
cases_more_desc: *These are just 3 highlighted examples of the more than 200 successful projects we have developed. Due to confidentiality policies with our corporate clients, most of our portfolio remains private.
final_cta_title_cases: Do you want results like these?
final_cta_desc_cases: Your company deserves a high-level digital showcase. Let's talk today.
faq_1_a: Depending on complexity, we deliver your Landing Page ready between 5 and 10 business days.
faq_2_q: Do you include Hosting and Domain?
faq_2_a: Yes, we deliver the site with everything configured (Hosting, Domain, and SSL) ready to sell.
faq_3_a: Absolutely. We give you access so you can update texts or images whenever you want.
faq_4_q: Do you build websites for overseas?
faq_4_a: Yes, we work with clients in Colombia, USA, and Europe. We adapt the site to your market.
tc_intro: Welcome to Jers Web Solutions. By hiring our services, the Client unconditionally accepts the following terms and conditions of service:
tc_1_text: Jers Web Solutions commits to design, develop, and implement the Landing Page or Website as agreed in the quote. This includes hosting, domain, and corporate email configuration.
tc_2_text: To start the project, a 50% down payment is required. The remaining 50% will be paid upon delivery. The down payment is non-refundable once design work has begun.
tc_3_text: Stipulated delivery times (usually 5-10 business days) begin when the Client delivers all required information.
tc_4_text: The project includes up to two (2) rounds of revisions. Major structural changes once approved will incur additional costs.
tc_5_text: We offer a 30-day technical warranty after delivery to correct code failures. It does not cover damages by third parties.
tc_6_text: Once final payment is completed, the Client obtains usage rights. Jers Web Solutions reserves the right to show the project in its portfolio.
tc_7_text: Hosting and Domain services are annual. It is the Client's responsibility to perform the annual renewal.
pp_intro: At Jers Web Solutions, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
pp_1_text: We collect personal information (name, email, phone) only when you contact us voluntarily.
pp_2_text: The collected information is used exclusively to respond to inquiries and provide contracted services.
pp_3_text: We implement digital security measures to protect your information. We do not sell or transfer your data to third parties.
pp_4_text: You have the right to request the deletion of your data at any time by writing to our corporate email.
pp_5_text: We reserve the right to update this policy. Any changes will be published on this page.
wtsp_tooltip: Have questions? Write to us for free advice. üöÄ
